com.github.wuic.engine.core

Class CssInspectorEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.wuic.engine.Engine
      • com.github.wuic.engine.NodeEngine
        • com.github.wuic.engine.core.TextInspectorEngine
          • com.github.wuic.engine.core.CssInspectorEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NutFilterHolder, Comparable<Engine>

    @EngineService(injectDefaultToWorkflow=true,
               isCoreEngine=true)
public class CssInspectorEngine
extends TextInspectorEngine

    This engines parses CSS files thanks to a CssUrlLineInspector and a SourceMapLineInspector.

    Since:
    0.3.3
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    Guillaume DROUET
